"Scratches":
"Scratches are a random purchase system that you can use to get things like items that will help you through your adventure, or appealing cosmetics.

You can purchase them by selecting \"Shop\" from the Main Menu, then selecting \"Draw Scratch\", then choosing from the currently-available Scratches."

"In addition to the AC Scratches and SG Scratches that give prizes like Costumes, Accessories and Lobby Actions, there will also be limited-time Scratches and Scratches that you can draw from for free once per day."
